body.p:
Headquarters Kentucky volunteers,
Adjutant= General's Office,
Frankfort, Jany 20", 1865.
Geo B. Baum Esq
Louisville, Ky.
Sir,
Herewith I send you authority to recruit a Company for one year State service.

Maj Duncan 13' Infy & Col Hays 10' Infy are each of them raising a Regiment of State troops and I would suggest that you act in concert with one of them in raising your Company as I doubt not it would be beneficial to both of you interests.

Respy
Your Obed Servt
D. W. Lindsey
Inspr & Adj Genl Ky

State service
Baum George B.
Authy cancelled
Mar 29, 1863-
Cancel authority
(Returned from Dead Letter Office).
D W Lindsey
Mch 27th 1865
